body:
Sorry for double post i accidently archieved my last post.

Ok, so I dont know the password to my account i registered this account with. So When i tried getting the password code sent to my Home phone (it cant take txt messages) It doesnt show up and theirs no option to make it a voice call. When i try to do the security questions it says my answers dont match... Please help...  If you can tell me how you can make it a voice call instead of a txt message...

thx
birdy

title: Help me migrate accounts.

replies.body: Do you have skype? I wouldn't mind you sending it to my phone number and, then I send it back to you.
